Overview  Package  Class   Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Uses of Interface
org.activebpel.rt.xml.IAeNamespaceContext

Packages that use IAeNamespaceContext
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def This package contains base classes and elements used to create BPEL model definitions. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.expr This package contains base classes and elements used for expression handling.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.expr.xpath This package contains implementation classes for an expression parser and analyzer for xpath language.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.query This package contains validation model implementation classes for query related validation. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation.variable This package contains validation model implementation classes for validating variables. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.javascript This package contains implementation classes for an expression parser and analyzer for the javascript language.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.xquery This package contains implementation classes for an expression parser and analyzer for xquery language.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.impl.xquery This package contains classes which support running expressions written in XQuery.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.function   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl This package contains the base classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity This package contains classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign This package contains implementation objects used for executing the assign activity. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support Includes supporting bpel objects which aren't properly activities.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr This package contains classes which support running expressions. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr.xpath This package contains classes which support running expressions written in XPath This implementation uses the Jaxen library in order to run expressions written in the XPath language. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.xpath.ast This package contains the base classes for implementing a Jaxen based XPath Abstract Syntax Tree.  
org.activebpel.rt.wsdl.def Classes that represent WSDL elements (partner links, port types, properties, and the like) and that serialize and deserialize them.  
org.activebpel.rt.xml Package which contains runtime components used by Active Endpoints plugins.

          Provides a way of resolving a namespace to a prefix or creating a new ns mapping.
